CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Tender_Date__c ), Opportunity_ID__c & " - " & Account_Name_Email_Template__c & " - " & Site_Address__c , TEXT(Tender_Date__c) & " " & Opportunity_ID__c & " - " & Account_Name_Email_Template__c & " - " & Site_Address__c)
CustomField.label: NZ Quote Request - Email Subject
